description: This Java class 'UtilityPaymentService' provides service methods for processing utility payments, including initiating payments and reading payment records. It interacts with the repository layer, maps data transfer objects, and communicates with an external banking core REST client.

classes.name: UtilityPaymentService
classes.description: A Spring service component handling utility payment processing, status updates, and retrieval of payment records.

methods.name: utilPayment
methods.description: Processes a utility payment request, updates transaction status, persists payment entity, calls external banking core REST API, and returns a success response.

methods.name: readPayments
methods.description: Retrieves a paginated list of utility payment DTOs.
